overview:
With a background in earth sciences and business consulting, Brett joined the predecessor to Neo Ventures in 2001 with a focus on investing in early stage Australian companies with innovative technologies, and the capability of expanding into global markets. Prior to Neo, Brett founded three strategy and business development firms through which he accrued broad-based experience spanning more than forty different industries, working with hundreds of different businesses ranging from small technology start-ups to global Fortune 50 corporations.

Three decades of significant management consulting, corporate turn-around and technology development projects involved the development and execution of business and sales strategies, business models and processes, market and channel strategies, operating structures and executive team recruitment, development and support. Brett graduated with a B.Sc from the University of Auckland, with a major in Geology, and is a member of the Cleantech China Advisory Board.
